quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
